justification: The offering is described as providing 'a robust environment for performing complex mathematical analytics and engineering calculations,' directly supporting requirements for physics-based modeling. Interfaces support workload-specific VMs and high-performance storage, with explicit mention of industry-standard security/compliance (GDPR, ISO, SOC 2). The ability statement confirms performing mathematical/statistical calculations for physics models and digital twins. Specific digital twin analytics features could be more detailed for a perfect score.
